name: Mecha Fighter
description:
Mecha Fighter is a fighting game brought to you by the Оurs Иot Мine team. Originally made for the LTRO-1, Lospec's first home console, as part of the first Lospec Jam. Here is a web build.

Note: In it's current state the game is playable, but not completely finished.

OИM consists of:
Car - Backgrounds and UI
Crub - Characters and Animation
pitzamachine - Programming
PixelDud - Programming
Tonestop - Music and Sound Design
